attributes.action: consider fully arming our Police Service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is time the Police Service caught up with the times and our Police Officers were routinely armed with sidearms when on duty.
The current situation where our Police Officers our facing armed criminals who are better armed than themselves is wrong and has to stop. It is scandalous that our Police Officers do not have the proper tools available to them to defend themselves and the public better. The current rise in Officer killed on duty by criminals and the rise in gun crime and threat of terrorism means the routine arming of our Police Service is essential.
